Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: You can review all the payments requiring your approval, or you can review all payments that are awaiting approval, including those that need your approval.\n

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Keyword.Param: We've also provided you with filter and sorting capabilities in case you're looking for a specific payment or set of payments.

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Param.Description: Variable 1

Keyword.Param: Select the payments you want to approve\n

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: Press the checkbox next to each of the payments you wish to approve.

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: After pressing the approve payments button you will then be able to confirm the set of payments you've selected to be approved.

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Param.Name: sNumber

Param.Name: sVar1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: Press the CONFIRM button to finalize your approvals or press CANCEL to return to the previous screen to make modifications to your selections.

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: Expand a payment to view approval history by pressing in the row. You'll then be able to see pending and prior approvers along with any comments made throughout the payment's approval.\n

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Keyword.Param: You can reach out to others for more information about a payment by making a comment which will notify any of the users you choose.

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: Import payments from your ERP or financial system into acomcloud.com using thenote_add(Create Payments) button.\n

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Keyword.Param: When the import process is started you will either have a custom import format to select from, or you will use our Standard acomcloud.com File Format (download a sample here).\n

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Keyword.Param: Custom formats don't happen by accident and therefore requires a very specific file format. If you're unsure of the file format you're supposed to use, contact our technical support team so they can guide you through the process.\n

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sNumber

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Keyword.Param: Use this area to view, filter and sort all pending payments individually or by import file, or bank account.\n

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Keyword.Param: This area also included pending payments that have already been assigned to a batch.\n

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Keyword.Param: \"Pending\" refers to the status of a payment that is eligible for processing.

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6
